data.name: The Hoebridge
data.full_address: The Hoebridge, Gattonside, Melrose TD6 9LZ, United Kingdom

reviews.review_text: Lovely meal with family. Booked ahead a few weeks before to be sure of a seat. Really attentive service. Food was well presented and tasty.

translations.en: Lovely meal with family. Booked ahead a few weeks before to be sure of a seat. Really attentive service. Food was well presented and tasty.

reviews.review_text: The Hoebridge was a fantastic dinner. The food was inventive and clearly picked with care. Beautiful and intimate setting with a flair of Nordic decor. The staff were lovely, conversational and care free. Well worth the trip from Edinburgh to spent a lovely evening with loved ones.

translations.en: The Hoebridge was a fantastic dinner. The food was inventive and clearly picked with care. Beautiful and intimate setting with a flair of Nordic decor. The staff were lovely, conversational and care free. Well worth the trip from Edinburgh to spent a lovely evening with loved ones.

reviews.review_text: Great food, great drinks, great atmosphere. Lovely spot.

translations.en: Great food, great drinks, great atmosphere. Lovely spot.

reviews.review_text: Great restaurant with fabulous food. The delightful barman produced a gorgeous Margarita. Kyle is charming front of house and passionate about his wines. Hamish, chef, turned out the nicest food I have eaten for a while, and certainly the best in the Melrose area.

translations.en: Great restaurant with fabulous food. The delightful barman produced a gorgeous Margarita. Kyle is charming front of house and passionate about his wines. Hamish, chef, turned out the nicest food I have eaten for a while, and certainly the best in the Melrose area.

reviews.review_text: Wow ! What an amazing place. The food was delicious and the staff couldn’t have been any nicer. We went for my daughter Jades 30th birthday and Kyle and Hamish went above and beyond to make it special for her. Thank yous so much. Wound definitely recommend x

translations.en: Wow ! What an amazing place. The food was delicious and the staff couldn’t have been any nicer. We went for my daughter Jades 30th birthday and Kyle and Hamish went above and beyond to make it special for her. Thank yous so much. Wound definitely recommend x

reviews.review_text:
Top notch in every aspect:
+ delicious food
+ excellent service
+ classy interior design
+ nice wine list and cocktail menu
+ fair prices

At our table with one omnivore and one vegan we both enjoyed our meal very much - please preorder your vegan menu since there is no such option on the standard menu.

Don‘t miss it!

translations.en:
Top notch in every aspect:
+ delicious food
+ excellent service
+ classy interior design
+ nice wine list and cocktail menu
+ fair prices

At our table with one omnivore and one vegan we both enjoyed our meal very much - please preorder your vegan menu since there is no such option on the standard menu.

Don‘t miss it!

reviews.review_text: Saying this was good would be an understatement. Very good service, atmosphere and obviously food. The ambient is amazing.

translations.en: Saying this was good would be an understatement. Very good service, atmosphere and obviously food. The ambient is amazing.

reviews.review_text: Incredible meal at The Hoebridge. The food was impeccable — everything was cooked to perfection and well presented. The cocktails were excellent, However, the food really stood out. The service was excellent too — friendly, attentive and made the whole experience easy and enjoyable. Easily one of the best meals I’ve had in a while and challenges even some of the best restaurants in Edinburgh. We look forward to coming back

translations.en: Incredible meal at The Hoebridge. The food was impeccable — everything was cooked to perfection and well presented. The cocktails were excellent, However, the food really stood out. The service was excellent too — friendly, attentive and made the whole experience easy and enjoyable. Easily one of the best meals I’ve had in a while and challenges even some of the best restaurants in Edinburgh. We look forward to coming back

reviews.review_text: A beautiful restaurant with a fantastic menu! The food was delicious and the service was great! Will definitely return if we’re in the area!

translations.en: A beautiful restaurant with a fantastic menu! The food was delicious and the service was great! Will definitely return if we’re in the area!

reviews.review_text: A truly memorable evening dining at The Hoebridge – beautiful interiors, exceptional service, and delicious food! Thank you!

translations.en: A truly memorable evening dining at The Hoebridge – beautiful interiors, exceptional service, and delicious food! Thank you!

reviews.review_text: Utterly wonderful. The service is superb. The wine and cocktail selection is outstanding and the food is fantastic. Highly recommended

translations.en: Utterly wonderful. The service is superb. The wine and cocktail selection is outstanding and the food is fantastic. Highly recommended

reviews.review_text:
I don't think their are enough words in the English vocabulary to describe how wonderful this fabulous pocket of heaven is.
So, briefly, probably the best restaurant I have eaten in .
Hamish and Kyle, you're totally extraordinary.

translations.en:
I don't think their are enough words in the English vocabulary to describe how wonderful this fabulous pocket of heaven is.
So, briefly, probably the best restaurant I have eaten in .
Hamish and Kyle, you're totally extraordinary.

reviews.review_text: Wow, that was exceptional. Beautifully prepared and presented, lovely service and a wonderful place. Thank you, guys!

translations.en: Wow, that was exceptional. Beautifully prepared and presented, lovely service and a wonderful place. Thank you, guys!

reviews.review_text: The food and service was excellent. Unfortunately for us the atmosphere was awful. It was incredibly noisy and we were seated right by the main thoroughfare. For a premium price restaurant i was very disappointed with the noise management. We had people standing next to our table for 10 minutes catching up and shouting from elsewhere in the restaurant throughout our stay. At £60 a head for 2 courses i had hoped for better.

translations.en: The food and service was excellent. Unfortunately for us the atmosphere was awful. It was incredibly noisy and we were seated right by the main thoroughfare. For a premium price restaurant i was very disappointed with the noise management. We had people standing next to our table for 10 minutes catching up and shouting from elsewhere in the restaurant throughout our stay. At £60 a head for 2 courses i had hoped for better.

reviews.review_text: The staff, the atmosphere and the food were all lovely. The pumpkin gnocchi were one of the best things I've ever eaten. Their focaccia was amazing too.

translations.en: The staff, the atmosphere and the food were all lovely. The pumpkin gnocchi were one of the best things I've ever eaten. Their focaccia was amazing too.

reviews.review_text: We had an awesome dinner at The Hoebridge.  The dishes were delicious and executed with finesse and style.  The service and atmosphere are relaxed but on point, and the dining room is paired back and cosy.  As we were both not drinking we had excellent non-alcoholic cocktails.  The dessert we had was simply amazing, a chocolate, hazelnut and salted caramel triumph. We will definitely be back again as it's simply the best in the area.

translations.en: We had an awesome dinner at The Hoebridge.  The dishes were delicious and executed with finesse and style.  The service and atmosphere are relaxed but on point, and the dining room is paired back and cosy.  As we were both not drinking we had excellent non-alcoholic cocktails.  The dessert we had was simply amazing, a chocolate, hazelnut and salted caramel triumph. We will definitely be back again as it's simply the best in the area.

reviews.review_text: The atmosphere and service at this restaurant were excellent. The host went out of his way to make sure all our needs were taken care of, even going so far as to offering a second steak because he wasn't sure the first one was done correctly. The restaurant itself had a lovely atmosphere and the background music was superb and very conducive to dining.

translations.en: The atmosphere and service at this restaurant were excellent. The host went out of his way to make sure all our needs were taken care of, even going so far as to offering a second steak because he wasn't sure the first one was done correctly. The restaurant itself had a lovely atmosphere and the background music was superb and very conducive to dining.

reviews.review_text: Wonderful experience! Can't wait to return,a very special place

translations.en: Wonderful experience! Can't wait to return,a very special place

reviews.review_text: Absolutely fabulous, from start to end. Very friendly and attentive staff with one of the co-owners showing interest and charm whilst running a fantastic front of house. Very chic minimalist interior in whites and greys, with beautiful wild flowers the only adornment other than smart tableware. Food was wonderful, great flavours and interesting combinations, without being too experimental. One of the best places we’ve ever eaten at. Do go!

translations.en: Absolutely fabulous, from start to end. Very friendly and attentive staff with one of the co-owners showing interest and charm whilst running a fantastic front of house. Very chic minimalist interior in whites and greys, with beautiful wild flowers the only adornment other than smart tableware. Food was wonderful, great flavours and interesting combinations, without being too experimental. One of the best places we’ve ever eaten at. Do go!

reviews.review_text: Went there for my mum's 70th birthday the staff are so friendly. The food was amazing and the drinks fantastic.

translations.en: Went there for my mum's 70th birthday the staff are so friendly. The food was amazing and the drinks fantastic.
